data.actual_result: File name extends past the normal constraints of the modal
data.expected_result: File name gets truncated or something
data.short_description: Deleting a file with a long name and a dash is not truncated and extends into the image modal
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a file with a nice long file name, like `pG4fBU3a3eBFqybM8tvbu1x-XYTFAJmJ3uw13i7vW5U.png` - Delete said file - Notice graphical bug that causes the name to extend past the notmal constraints of the modal
